verses.verse: To the <S%H5329>chief<s%> <S%H5329>Musician,<s%> A <S%H4210>Psalm<s%> of <S%H1732>David.<s%> <S%H5704>How<s%> <S%H5704>long<s%> will you <S%H7911>forget<s%> me, O <S%H3068>LORD?<s%> for <S%H5331>ever?<s%> <S%H5704>how<s%> <S%H5704>long<s%> will you <S%H5641>hide<s%> your <S%H6440>face<s%> from me?

<S%H5704>How<s%> <S%H5704>long<s%> shall I <S%H7896>take<s%> <S%H6098>counsel<s%> in my <S%H5315>soul,<s%> having <S%H3015>sorrow<s%> in my <S%H3824>heart<s%> <S%H3119>daily?<s%> <S%H5704>how<s%> <S%H5704>long<s%> shall my <S%H341>enemy<s%> be <S%H7311>exalted<s%> <S%H5921>over<s%> me?

<S%H5027>Consider<s%> and <S%H6030>hear<s%> me, O <S%H3068>LORD<s%> my <S%H430>God:<s%> <S%H215>lighten<s%> my <S%H5869>eyes,<s%> <S%H6435>lest<s%> I <S%H3462>sleep<s%> the sleep of <S%H4194>death;<s%>

<S%H6435>Lest<s%> my <S%H341>enemy<s%> <S%H559>say,<s%> I have <S%H3201>prevailed<s%> against him; and those that <S%H6862>trouble<s%> me <S%H1523>rejoice<s%> <S%H3588>when<s%> I am <S%H4131>moved.<s%>
But I have <S%H982>trusted<s%> in your <S%H2617>mercy;<s%> my <S%H3820>heart<s%> shall <S%H1523>rejoice<s%> in your <S%H3444>salvation.<s%>
I will <S%H7891>sing<s%> to the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> <S%H3588>because<s%> he has <S%H1580>dealt<s%> <S%H1580>bountifully<s%> with me.
